Message.Title: CNBC is in search of rmore Bears to bring on the network
Message.Msg: They love to control who and what to say They will start panic in the AM for smart money to come and buy in the PM

Topic.Title: Why so many people say Cramers mojo is gone

Message.Msg: Perhaps it is "Ugly out there" in the part of northeast you are, but the economy is just fine in greater Boston area. Retail sales set record, malls and resturants crowded, luxury items & car sales strong, home sales and prices up, tax revenue in good shape.. No problems here. Oh, except for those that lost jobs in sectors that needed to lose jobs, usually with too-generous benefits. But that is good for over-all healthy economy.

Topic.Title: Why so many people say Cramers mojo is gone

Message.Msg: His advice is worth every penny you pay for it.

Message.Title: Bad Economy? Not Really.
Message.Msg: Perhaps it is "Ugly out there" in the part of northeast you are, but the economy is just fine in greater Boston area. Retail sales set record, malls and resturants crowded, luxury items & car sales strong, home sales and prices up, tax revenue in good shape.. No problems here. Oh, except for those that lost jobs in sectors that needed to lose jobs, usually with too-generous benefits. But that is good for over-all healthy economy.

Topic.Title: Why so many people say Cramers mojo is gone

Message.Msg: thats always been the case. Nothing has changed. He still gets excited and his stock picking is below average as it always has been, just like the rest of us.
Washington fatcats gleefully scooping up cheap shares for January pop.
